subject: Gambling
Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer said that he spoke with Ted Forstmann after a lawsuit charged that the head of IMG had increased a bet on the 2007 French Open final after consulting with Federer.
snippet: Roger Federer said that he spoke with Ted Forstmann after a lawsuit charged that the head of IMG had increased a bet on the 2007 French Open final after consulting with Federer.
